sections.heading: Abuse of the enjoyment; consequencesThe usufruct may be terminated by the naked owner if the usufructuary commits waste, alienates things without authority, neglects to make ordinary repairs, or abuses his enjoyment in any other manner
sections.text: Acts 1976, No. 103, ยง1; Acts 2010, No. 881, ยง1, eff. July 2, 201
